docs.text: Vira Ivanova Guadalajara Before becoming a technical writer Vira worked as a project lead and a researcher for seven years. For another seven she worked as a journalist. Currently, Vira creates developer guides and documents AWS-based solutions. Vira is passionate about writing in a brief and clear manner to promote effortless comprehension.
